metadata.name: !!! (RGON) Co-Op HUD+
metadata.description:
[h1] THIS MOD REQUIRES REPENTOGON WHICH CAN NOT BE INSTALLED LIKE A NORMAL MOD, READ MORE [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3127536138]HERE[/url] [/h1]
Co-Op HUD+ is a mod that completely overhauls the in-game HUD to better display information when playing with multiple people. This mod is based on coopHUD by Srokks, which is no longer being updated.
[h3] Features [/h3] [list] [*] Renders active items, hearts, pocket items, and trinkets in a readable position for all four players [*] Stats for all four players displayed relative to their character info (P1 and P3 on left, P2 and P4 on right) [*] Player color coding (P1 Blue, P2 Red, P3 Green, P4 Yellow) [*] Press H to switch between Co-Op HUD+ and the default HUD [*] Timer always shown at the top of the screen [*] Tainted Isaac Inventory correctly displayed for all players [*] Tainted ??? Poop Spells correctly displayed for all players [*] Tainted Cain Bag of Crafting correctly displayed for all players [*] Entirely customizable! [*] Custom Health API Compatible [*] Custom callbacks [*] Renders picked up collectables for all players! [/list]
[h3] Customization [/h3] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2681875787] Mod Config Menu [/url] recommended, but not required. The placement of literally everything can be changed, so please feel free to make the HUD unique to you! Everything can be configured through MCM. You can also modify the config file directly, instructions can be found [url=https://github.com/Konoca/Co-Op_HUD_plus/wiki/Customization] here [/url]
[h3] Want to add support for your mod? [/h3] Check out the [url=https://github.com/Konoca/Co-Op_HUD_plus/wiki/Callbacks] wiki [/url] to see how to make use of the custom callbacks! Don't see a callback that fits your needs? Feel free to request one
[h3] Bug Reporting [/h3] All issues should either be reported [url=https://github.com/Konoca/Co-Op_HUD_plus/issues] here [/url] or by creating a Discussion thread. Please include as much detail as you can, including: [list] [*] How to replicate the bug [*] Any mods that contributed to the bug [*] Console logs [*] Any other info you think is relevant [/list]
